name: BeatBots
description:
BeatBots is a local 2-player rhythm game where you play as a musician robot in Cyberpunk world and try to be the better performer of the concert.

Memorize and push the correct button at the right moment to attract viewers. The player with more fans when the music ends, wins.

The flashing screens at bottom left and bottom right show which buttons should the corresponding player press.

Controls:

WASD - for the player on the left

Arrow Keys - for the player on the right

Escape - Pause

(Because of the way the code works right now, if you press more or less buttons than shown, it messes up rest of your timings in that phase. Should be fixed later on.)
